video_prompt: Anime character flicks a lighter, sparks briefly illuminating his face and hair. Posters on the alley wall subtly shift as distant streetlights dim and brighten. Reflections ripple on the wet ground.
image_prompt: Anime-style young man with vibrant pink hair and purple eyes, wearing a distressed dark denim jacket over a light purple shirt, leaning against a graffiti-adorned alley wall. He is flicking a metal lighter. Detailed vertical shot, urban night, wet ground, dramatic lighting.
refined_video_prompt: An anime character flicks a lighter, generating a brief spark flash that illuminates his face and hair before quickly fading. Posters on the alley wall subtly sway. Distant streetlights flicker, repeatedly dimming and brightening. Reflections actively undulate and distort across the ground.
